answers: Hi! I'm an agent designed to demonstrate operator requests. You can ask me about my purpose, or ask to speak with a person. If I fail to understand your statement, I'll connect you with a person automatically. How can I help you?

You can ask me for several tasks:
• Ask Information for product selling
• Purchase
• Refund
• Track package status
• Track Refund process

*Please ask for the item list before start the purchase action to prevent any misunderstanding.*
